# Airtable Customer Sheet

## Listing out total rows of customer sheet

# I'm a note 
## Check if the Customer ID from BTSD (new order/customer) exists in CCUST (customer sheet).

üîÑ Steps:

Get Customer ID from BTSD node.

Normalize it: toString(), .trim(), .toLowerCase().

Loop through all rows in CCUST node.

Compare each row‚Äôs Customer ID the same way.

If match found:

‚úÖ Return: "Customer ID is found in Customer Sheet"

If not found:

‚ùå Return: "Customer ID is not available in Customer Sheet"

üîç Use Case:
Useful for checking duplicates before saving customer data, or for tagging new vs. existing customers.

‚öôÔ∏è Returns:
Same data from BTSD + a message field with status.

# Airtable Customer Sheet

## Listing out total rows of customer sheet

## Return Only Last Row
Purpose: Get the last item from all incoming rows and pass it forward.

üìå How it works:

$input.all() ‚Üí Fetches all incoming items.

rows[rows.length - 1] ‚Üí Picks the last item.

return [lastRow]; ‚Üí Sends only the last row to the next node.

üì¶ Use Case:
Use when you only want to process or forward the latest record

# Auto-Increment "S No" from Previous Node
## Take the serial number (S No) from previous node data, increment it by 1, and return the updated data.

üìå How it works:

Reads the first item from the input.

Checks for "S No"  field.

If missing or invalid, uses 0 as default.

Adds +1 to generate the new serial number.

Returns the full original data + updated "S No" field.

# Airtable Sheet
## Appending data in Airtable of new Customer Sheet

# Airtable Customer Sheet
## Updating the existing Customer Record in customer sheet like if he/she has changed the personal details like Address, Email Address, Contact number.

## This automation is built in n8n (a no-code/low-code automation platform). It automatically updates or adds customer data into your system every time a customer places an order on your Shopify store ‚Äî whether they're a new customer or an existing one.

No manual copy-pasting. No missing data. Everything gets updated in real time.


## üöÄ How Does It Help?

‚úÖ Keeps your customer records up-to-date automatically

‚úÖ Tracks new vs. repeat customers

‚úÖ Avoids duplicate entries

‚úÖ Makes customer follow-ups, marketing, and analytics more powerful

‚úÖ Saves you time ‚Äî no more downloading/exporting/importing from Shopify

## üîß How It Works (in Simple Terms)

When someone places an order:

1. ‚úÖ The order data from Shopify is captured


2. üß† The automation checks:

Is this a new customer or an existing one?

Does their data already exist in your Airtable/CRM system?



3. ‚úç If they are new ‚Üí it adds a new customer entry
If they already exist ‚Üí it updates their data with the new order

## üß± Technical Workflow (n8n Nodes Overview)

Here‚Äôs how this is structured inside n8n:

1. Webhook / Shopify Trigger Node ‚Äì Triggers when a new order is received


2. IF Node ‚Äì Checks if the customer already exists


3. Airtable Lookup Node ‚Äì Searches for customer ID


4. Set Node ‚Äì Prepares structured customer/order data


5. Create or Update Node ‚Äì

If customer not found ‚Üí Create New Customer Row

If customer found ‚Üí Update Their Info

 
## üõç Real-World Benefits for Store Owners

Imagine this:

A new customer places an order. Their full profile is saved ‚Äî instantly.

A regular customer comes back? Their last order date gets updated.

You want to send marketing emails? Your customer database is ready.


## No need to export orders from Shopify, filter duplicates, and clean data ‚Äî the system does it for you.


You save time, avoid errors, and create a stronger customer experience ‚Äî all automated.
